dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description:
Welcome back, Sabrina! You have 1 design token
and 3 components to check out for today.

colors.title: Color
colors.description: Colors are designed to be clear and accessible. They come in different color themes, constituted each one of grays, semantic and label colors.

issues.title: Issues
issues.description: An issue should describe a task with a clear, defined outcome. This could be a piece of code, design, document, or action to be taken.
